subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
Blacks
lead_paragraph: Irvin, among the most talented players in the Negro leagues, was already 30 when he joined the New York Giants in 1949. “I was way past my peak then,” he later said.
snippet: Irvin, among the most talented players in the Negro leagues, was already 30 when he joined the New York Giants in 1949. “I was way past my peak then,” he later said.
